about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Milgrid the Mining Mage! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Milgrid if you don't already own her! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials.


This pack includes:
  • Milgrid the Mining Mage (if you don't already own her)
  • The Winged Wand of Rock Flight (Golden Epic)
  • Two other Rare pieces of gear for Milgrid the Mining Mage
  • 3000 Common Crafting Materials
detailed_description:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Milgrid the Mining Mage! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Milgrid if you don't already own her! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials.


This pack includes:
  • Milgrid the Mining Mage (if you don't already own her)
  • The Winged Wand of Rock Flight (Golden Epic)
  • Two other Rare pieces of gear for Milgrid the Mining Mage
  • 3000 Common Crafting Materials

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor

name: Crusaders of the Lost Idols: Milgrid's Epic Starter Pack

  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
